	at

(PortableRemoteObject.java:296)

ie. when i try to narrow to a get the home object.

I dont get this when i run the test as a single test. I het this only 
when i run all the tests together thru a ANT script.

When i was reasearching on this, i got a suggestion to define a 
junit.properties file and add loading=false in it. I did that and 
placed in c:\ while with the system variable user.home pointing to c:\
Still that does not help.

Anybody got a idea why this is happening?
